item.description:
Spirits of Salem Pub Crawl runs at 7:00 PM Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays in October
Our popular supernatural-themed stroll visits several of Salem?s most ?spirited? taverns. Hear authentic paranormal tales of Salem?s storied establishments and enter the taverns themselves for additional ?spirits? ? of an alcoholic nature! Tavern visits limited to 30 minutes per stop. Please allow up to three hours for complete event. Walk covers approximately one-half mile. Space limited to 20 participants ? book early! 21+ only.
$20 for Adults

I will make a reservation~

http://www.salemhisto...
